channel.title: Need a ::suggest command!
channel.description:
ok, basically i need a ::suggest command that allows players to suggest stuff for new updates to me. so it could look like
::suggest we should get dragons in varrock
and it sends the message to me even if im offline
can some1 plz help me with this? thanx

item.title: Need a ::suggest command!
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[code=java]if (command.startsWith(“suggest”)) {
sendMessage(“Suggestion has been sent”);
BufferedWriter bw = null;
String suggestion = command.substring(8);

		try {
			bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("suggestions/suggestions.txt", true));
			bw.write(playerName + ": " + suggestion);
			bw.newLine();
			bw.flush();
		} catch (IOException ioe) {
			ioe.printStackTrace();
		} finally {
			if (bw != null) {
				try {
					bw.close();
				} catch (IOException ioe2) {
					sendMessage("There was an error while trying to send the suggestion");
				}
			}
		}
	}[/code]

You can create a new file called “suggestions” specifically for suggestions or if you want you can change it to which ever location you want by changing this line

bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("which ever location here/suggestions.txt", true));

If I forgot something let me know/

Read full topic

should i put suggest.txt in the config folder?
[/quote]

You’ll need to make the suggest command first. Which I am not helping you with, because I’m busy at the moment, with my own server.[/quote]

ok well can some1 quickly help me with the suggest command plz?
